text.0: drink the best draught of somajuice o vāyu at our holy rites.
text.1: for thou art he who drinketh first.
text.2: come teamdrawn with thy hundred helps with indra seated in the car.
text.3: vāyu and drink your fill of juice.
text.4: may steeds a thousand bring you both indra and vāyu hitherward.
text.5: to drink the soma to the feast.
text.6: for ye o indravāyu mount the goldenseated car that aids.
text.8: on farrefulgent chariot come unto the man who offers gifts.
text.10: here indravāyu is the juice drink it accordant with the gods.
text.12: hither o indravāyu be your journey here unyoke your steeds.
text.13: here for your draught of soma juice.
